snippet: The videos were conceived by Esquire magazine to promote an article in the March issue about the mass killing of exotic animals last fall in Zanesville, Ohio.
abstract: The videos were conceived by Esquire magazine to promote an article in the March issue about the mass killing of exotic animals last fall in Zanesville, Ohio.

headline.main: Now, a Trailer for a Magazine Article
headline.print_headline: A Trailer for a Magazine Piece
